name: Rush Restaurant
description:
You are a lone waiter in a medieval themed restaurant and your task is to keep the patrons of the restaurant happy. Collect orders on time and deliver the right food to your clients! Will you get the high score or will you be fired before your shift ends!

A simple concept developed within a month(14th March - 14th April) as a personal challenge. Maybe more to follow!

Assets

Music: “YT Nation”, from PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
